attribute.description: The attribute (header name) to look for auth data. Optional, default value: "authorization".

audience.description: Deprecated: use Providers instead. Audience of the token, used during the verification. For example: "https://accounts.google.com" or "https://login.salesforce.com". Required unless IgnoreAudience is true.

groups_claim.description: Deprecated: use Providers instead. The claim that holds the subject's group membership information. Optional.

ignore_audience.description: Deprecated: use Providers instead. When true, this skips validating the audience field. Optional.

issuer_ca_path.description: Deprecated: use Providers instead. The local path for the issuer CA's TLS server cert. Optional.

issuer_url.description: Deprecated: use Providers instead. IssuerURL is the base URL for the OIDC provider. Required.

providers.description: Providers allows configuring multiple OIDC providers. Use the getProviderConfigs() method to get the full list of providers, including the legacy configuration.
